phrase.text: Ah, thank you, my young Iberian friends. I have been locked up in this outpost for so long that I had almost given up all hope...
I was part of a Narbonensis Gaul tribe who was fighting against the Romans. Unfortunately, despite our best efforts, the enemy proved too powerful for us.

Maybe we could help each other. Should you go through the eastern passage and kill the Romans in our camp, I am sure all survivors will join you in your battle. I assure you they will be quite an asset. They are brave men.
